title: Scholarship Site
description: A site for researching and applying for scholarships in canada
heading: Account Information

referralLink.heading: Referral Link:
referralLink.description: Getting others to sign up with this link will add one referral to all current promotions. Gain referrals to be eligible for referral prizes!

success.title: Link copied!
success.message: Share the link with your friends for a chance to win prizes!

error.title: Your browser does not support clipboard copying.
error.message: Plese copy your referral link manually: {value}. You can do this using your "copy" command now.

promoThreashholdTemplate: Requires **{threashold}** referrals to be eligible for prize.
eligible: You are eligible for this prize
notEligible: You need {value} more referrals to be eligible for this prize
winner: A winner has been drawn for this promotion
noReferrals: *You do not have any referrals for this promotion.*
